name: Steel
description: Steel - almost ideal reflector, very little penetration
_comment_sound_speed: Sound speed in layer, m/s (5800-6100 range, using average 5950)
_comment_attenuation: Attenuation coefficient at 1 kHz, dB/m (0.01-0.05 dB/m/kHz range, using average 0.03)
_comment_default_thickness: Default layer thickness, m (steel is typically a thin layer/surface)
source: Typical values for steel - almost ideal reflector, SBP sees only surface
